name: CheckMyTrip
0:
”Alexa, ask check my trip, is my flight delayed.”
”Alexa, open check my trip.”
”Alexa, ask check my trip, when does my flight start.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: check my trip
Developer Terms of Use
des:
CheckMyTrip is the must-have travel app. Get flight updates, 5-day weather, maps, taxi, parking, restaurants and tours – everything you need to Travel Fearlessly. Ideal for business travelers and frequent fliers to stay productive and enjoy unique local experiences. Essential for leisure holiday seekers to navigate unfamiliar destinations and maximize the fun. It's free, easy to use and loaded with trip alerts, planning tools and more to get you safely from door to door. Now you can use Alexa to ask about your flight details to be even more prepared for your next trip.

To use the skill, you need a CheckMyTrip-Account (www.checkmytrip.com)

You can add trips in your CheckMyTrip App (iOS and Android) or on www.checkmytrip.com.

The skill uses Open Source Software: OSIN OAuth2, (C) 2013 Rangel Reale, 3-clause BSD
